value.desc: Use v-model to control visible state

type.desc: The type of pdf viewer engine to use

error-string.desc: Used to display an error string should all efforts fail to open the PDF
error-string.default: This browser does not support PDFs. Download the PDF to view it:
examples: Download the PDF to view it:

load.desc: The function to be called when the pdf document has been loaded

error.desc: The function to be called when the pdf document has an error

content-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the PDF container

content-style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the PDF container

inner-content-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the PDF object

inner-content-style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the PDF object
